attributes.action: To abide by the eu referendum result and ignore requests for a 2nd vote
attributes.additional_details: I am a professional person. I am a registered general nurse, university educated to degree level.  I am a community nurse helping nurse many people in my local community,  listening to a multitude of local people's views, beliefs , visions for our great country.  I am also very interested in politics .
attributes.background: The rules of the referendum were made perfectly clear before the vote, if the result had of gone the other way and remain had won they would also dismiss calls for a 2nd referendum calling it sour grapes, well that's exactly what it is.  Everyone should accept the decision and move forward.
